alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 9:13AM CST until January 04 at 8:22AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Loosahatchie River at Arlington For the Loosahatchie River...including Arlington...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Loosahatchie River at Arlington. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Brief Road is flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 18.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning to 21.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight to 2.1 feet Friday evening. It will rise to 2.3 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
